bibl.title: The Disappearance of Cambyses Army in the Western Desert. A Rereading in the Story of Herodotus.
bibl.note: EL SHEIKH Hussein, The Disappearance of Cambyses Army in the Western Desert. A Rereading in the Story of Herodotus.

Nicola BONACASA, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano] (Cairo, s.d.) pp. 43-47, 2 pll.
